Question.Subject: Is there a free web site where I can get information about someone?
Question.Content: Im looking up my friends background... please no dumb answers... thankzzz
Question.ChosenAnswer:
Here's free sites I've had success finding info: http://www.cvgadget.com/ http://pipl.com/ http://wink.com/ http://www.peekyou.com/ http://www.criminalsearches.com/ http://www.whitepages.com/ http://www.peoplefinders.com/ http://friendfeed.com/ http://www.spock.com/ http://www.netronline.com/ http://zabasearch.com/ http://www.spokeo.com/ http://www.rapleaf.com/ http://www.publicdata.com/ http://www.birthdatabase.com/query.php
And there's LexisNexis, the gold standard of researching facts for law firms, corporations, academic institutions and governments, but it's not free. http://www.lexisnexis.com/
...

Answer.Content: Nothing free simply because such a site costs a lot to maintain accurately

what sort of information? if you just want a criminal history then in the search box type in whatever county you live in followed by the words "court docket" for instance I live in Winnebago county so I would put winnebago county court dockets and you will usually find a site where you can put in the person's name and their criminal history will be available to look at because it is public domain. Here is the one for my county for example: http://www.co.winnebago.il.us/jwalk/jwalkframes.html?jvmven=Microsoft+Corp.&jvmver=1.1.4&msjvmver=5.0.3810

You could try this website here, it is prety comprehensive...
http://www.squidoo.com/Best-Online-Site-For-Public-Records

Here's free sites I've had success finding info: http://www.cvgadget.com/ http://pipl.com/ http://wink.com/ http://www.peekyou.com/ http://www.criminalsearches.com/ http://www.whitepages.com/ http://www.peoplefinders.com/ http://friendfeed.com/ http://www.spock.com/ http://www.netronline.com/ http://zabasearch.com/ http://www.spokeo.com/ http://www.rapleaf.com/ http://www.publicdata.com/ http://www.birthdatabase.com/query.php
And there's LexisNexis, the gold standard of researching facts for law firms, corporations, academic institutions and governments, but it's not free. http://www.lexisnexis.com/
...
